hu.oe.nik.szfmv.automatedcar.systemcomponents

Class SystemComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.oe.nik.szfmv.automatedcar.systemcomponents.SystemComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ACC, Driver, EmergencyBrake, FrontBackDetector, GasBrake, GearShift, Index, LaneKeepAssistant, ParkingPilote, ParkingPilotFunction, PowertrainSystem, ReverseRadar, RoadLaneDetector, RoadSignDetection, SensorsVisualizer, SteeringSystem, SteeringWheel, TrackingBut, UltrasonicSensor

    public abstract class SystemComponent
extends Object
    This class represents common features for system components By extending this class, the component is registered towards the virtual function bus automatically on instantiation.
